params.givenReceiversLen: The length of the receivers array
params.givenSecretsLen: The length of the secrets array

params.index: The index of the member in the set

params.receivers: array of addresses to receive the funds

FullBatch().notice: Batch is full, during batch operations

InvalidWithdrawalAddress(address).notice: Invalid withdrawal address, when the receiver is the contract itself or 0x0

MismatchedBatchSize(uint256,uint256).notice: Batch size mismatch, when the length of secrets and receivers are not equal

MemberRegistered(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new member is added to the set

MemberWithdrawn(uint256).notice: Emitted when a member is removed from the set

DEPTH().notice: The depth of the merkle tree

MEMBERSHIP_DEPOSIT().notice: The deposit amount required to register as a member

SET_SIZE().notice: The size of the merkle tree, i.e 2^depth

idCommitmentIndex().notice: The index of the next member to be registered

members(uint256).notice: The membership status of each member

register(uint256).notice: Allows a user to register as a member

stakedAmounts(uint256).notice: The amount of eth staked by each member

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Allows a user to slash a member

withdrawBatch(uint256[],address[]).notice: Allows a user to slash a batch of members
